statements: SELECT * FROM game_configurations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, theme FROM game_configurations WHERE difficulty_level > 2;
SELECT player_id, theme, sound_enabled FROM game_configurations WHERE player_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM game_configurations WHERE sound_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT id, player_id, theme FROM game_configurations WHERE difficulty_level = 1;
SELECT id, theme, sound_enabled, difficulty_level, player_id FROM game_configurations WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM game_configurations WHERE difficulty_level > 3 AND sound_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT theme, player_id FROM game_configurations WHERE theme LIKE '%forest%' ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT id, sound_enabled, difficulty_level FROM game_configurations WHERE difficulty_level BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_configurations WHERE player_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND sound_enabled = TRUE ORDER BY difficulty_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_configurations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, game_setting_1 FROM game_configurations WHERE player_id = 5;
SELECT player_id, game_setting_1, game_setting_2 FROM game_configurations WHERE id > 4;
SELECT * FROM player_experiences WHERE level <= 5;
SELECT player_id, level FROM player_experiences WHERE experience_points >= 1000;

SELECT player_id, experience_points FROM player_experiences WHERE level > 10;
SELECT game_setting_1, game_setting_2, player_id FROM game_configurations WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM player_profiles ORDER BY player_score DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_level FROM player_profiles WHERE player_level > 10;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_score FROM player_profiles WHERE player_score BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT preference_id, player_id, favorite_game FROM player_preferences WHERE favorite_game = 'Chess';
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM game_settings;

SELECT player_name, player_score FROM player_profiles WHERE player_score BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT * FROM player_preferences WHERE favorite_game = 'Chess';
SELECT player_name, player_level, player_score FROM player_profiles ORDER BY player_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM GameConfigurations;
SELECT config_id, config_name FROM GameConfigurations WHERE config_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM PlayerProfiles WHERE player_level > 10;
SELECT bonus_name, bonus_multiplier FROM GameBonuses ORDER BY bonus_multiplier DESC;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name, achievement_date FROM PlayerAchievements WHERE player_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM GameConfigurations;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM PlayerProfiles WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT config_name, config_value FROM GameConfigurations WHERE config_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT player_name, achievement_name, achievement_date FROM PlayerProfiles JOIN PlayerAchievements ON PlayerProfiles.player_id = PlayerAchievements.player_id;
SELECT config_name, bonus_name, bonus_multiplier FROM GameConfigurations JOIN GameBonuses ON GameConfigurations.config_id = GameBonuses.bonus_id ORDER BY bonus_multiplier DESC;

SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_profiles WHERE player_level > 10;
SELECT level_name, level_difficulty FROM game_levels ORDER BY level_difficulty DESC;

SELECT item_name, item_quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM game_settings;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_profiles WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT level_name, level_difficulty FROM game_levels ORDER BY level_difficulty DESC;
SELECT player_name, score_value FROM player_profiles JOIN player_scores ON player_profiles.player_id = player_scores.player_id WHERE score_value > 100 ORDER BY score_value DESC;
SELECT player_name, item_name, item_quantity FROM player_profiles JOIN player_inventory ON player_profiles.player_id = player_inventory.player_id WHERE item_quantity > 0 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
